level.heading: Confidentiality; public information.
level.text: Notwithstanding any provision of law to the contrary, information submitted to the Department pursuant to this subchapter is confidential and is not a public record. Data compiled in aggregate form by the Department for the purposes of reporting required by this subchapter is a public record as long as it does not reveal trade information that is protected by District, state, or federal law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-164
level.text: For Law 15-164, see notes following ยง 48-831.01.
